title: Happy Birthday, Riko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Riko, happy birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Thank you, Ai-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hey, Riko, now that you’ve grown up a bit, do you have a goal you want to achieve?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Huh? A goal?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It could be something you just want to try once or some sort of challenge.  Ai-san would love to help~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hmm...... I can’t think of anything off the top of my head. How about we come up with something together, Ai-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Huh? Me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah. After all, you’re great at coming up with fun things to do, Ai-chan. I think if we brainstorm together, we’re bound to have a fun challenge to overcome.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh! That’s a compliment! Hehe, I’m happy to hear that! Okay, then let’s think together~! Umm, if I were you, I would probably try going on an adventure in a jungle, river rafting down the Amazon River, or trekking in the South Pole...... Ah! I want to discover a black hole!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Wait! Hold on! Think of things that are a little more doable for me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
